archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0608
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to view my no-plan rules and my plan options, so that I can easily get back on a plan

properties.value: Plan options mean selecting a new plan or retrying payment and go back to the previous plan? Just show the list of available plans for the customer to choose from. A simple flow of changing the plan. For how long those options should be available? 12 months?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
